# [Interview #1146: Shadows of Self-Idaho Falls, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1146#6)

#### Seonid

"If Cultivation and Honor were romantically involved, why did Cultivation not help Honor against Odium?"

#### Brandon Sanderson

"She did."
